comments.author: simonai1254
comments.snippet:
Do you have Scaling enabled in windows or not? (Have a look at Windows Settings > System > Display > Select the corresponding display > Scale & Layout).
I did not notice this effect, but am running with 100% scaling. If it's not at 100% this means that everything is scaled, and I guess this affects the images as well. Maybe one would need higher resolution icons for the menu if this really is an issue...
